body.section:
This section introduce the application, its initialization and main features.
Have a look at the FAQ to get the server installation requirements.

Installation is made of two mandatories steps :
Download the last release from the Download section and extract the archive anywhere you wish.
Configure the installation according to your need. More information in the Server operations section
Open your browser, and enter the URL http://${server_ip}:8080/roomeeting/.
For example, if the server is hosted on your computer, the URL becomes http://localhost:8080/roomeeting/
Follow the Administration Guide in order to get the application ready for your users.

section.name: Administration guide
section.subsection:
1. Modify your email and password
The first time you connect to the application, an admin account is provided :
Login : admin
Password : admin
Go to the profile panel, clicking the profile icon on the top left of the screen, and update the information.

2. Setup your data
Initialize your sites and related rooms with the GUI provided.

3. Create users
Create users with their according role. On creation, each user will receive an e-mail to be notified of their password.
Role Admin : Access the whole site
Role Supervisor : Manage Feedbacks. Cannot administer RooMeeting
Role User : Only booking feature is allowed
